[ library(chr) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

chr_notrace

Deactivates the standard or Opium debugger extension for constraint handling rules.

Description

The query chr_trace. deactivates the standard or opium debugger. In case of the Opium debugger, its window remains until quited.

Fail Conditions

None.

Resatisfiable

No.

Examples

   Success:
[eclipse]: chr_notrace.
yes.
Debugger switched off

See Also

chr_opium / 0, chr_trace / 0
